edu.utah.bmi.ibiomes.pub

Class IBIOMESFileFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.utah.bmi.ibiomes.pub.IBIOMESFileFactory

  • public class IBIOMESFileFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to instantiate files or collections in iBIOMES.
    Author:
    Julien Thibault
